input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: POMERANIAN REGIONAL TOURIST ORGANIZATION. Summary: Repositioning and Image Campaign for Horse Tourism in the South Baltic Area, as Part of the Interreg South Baltic Project "Horse Tourism for Everyone".. Description: Pursuant to Art. 38 section 1 of the Public Procurement Law (consolidated text: Journal of Laws of 2024, item 1320, as amended), the Pomeranian Regional Tourist Organization is the Ordering Party authorized to conduct the procedure and award the contract to the Contractor whose offer will be selected as the most advantageous one on behalf of and for the benefit of the four financing partners from which the financing of the activities that are the subject of the contract will come, i.e.: Pomeranian Regional Tourist Organization (Poland) Bocianie Foundation Nest in Runowo (Poland) Administration of the Kretinga District Self-Government (Lithuania) Museum in Kretinga (Lithuania) The Pomeranian Regional Tourist Organization (PROT) is the leader of the public procurement and is responsible for organizing the tender procedure in on behalf of the four funding partners. After selecting the contractor, each partner financing the activities will sign a separate agreement with the contractor and pay his/her share of the remuneration. 1. The subject of the contract is co-financed by the Interreg program South Baltic 2021-2027 Measure 3.1 Developing sustainable, resilient and innovative tourism. 2. The tender is conducted as a joint order of four partner institutions as part of the international cooperation project "Horse tourism for everyone - supporting the inclusive and citizen-oriented development of horse tourism in the South Baltic area", which is co-financed by the EU under the Interreg South Baltic 2021-2027 program. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MINISTRY OF DIGITIZATION. Summary: Comprehensive Service of Preparing the Exhibition Stand of the Ministry of Digitization during the Mobile World Congress (Mwc) 2026 in Barcelona. Description: 1. The subject of the order is a comprehensive service consisting in the design, construction, assembly and disassembly of exhibition structures along with technical support of the stand during the international trade fair Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2026 in Barcelona. The detailed description of the subject of the order constitutes Annex No. 1 to the Specification, and the order will be implemented on the terms specified in the Draft Provisions of the contract constituting Annex No. 2 to the Specification. 2. The Ordering Party provides for the possibility invalidation of the contract award procedure if the public funds that the contracting authority intended to use to finance all or part of the contract were not awarded (in accordance with Article 257 of the Public Procurement Act). 3. The Ordering Party, in accordance with Art. 222 paragraph 4 of the Public Procurement Act specifies the amount it intends to allocate to finance the order, i.e. PLN 1,500,600.00 gross. 4. DATE OF THE FAIR: March 2 - 5, 2026 (Monday - Thursday), from 08:00 to 19:00. 5. The offer must include the document referred to in Chapter XV of the SWZ, i.e.: Concept and visualization of the development of the exhibition space, if the Contractor applies for points in the evaluation criterion. 6. Deadline for completing the order: from the date of signing the contract to March 15, 2026, and taking into account the deadlines referred to in the Draft Provisions of the Agreement constituting Annex No. 2 to the SWZ. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MAZOWIECKIE CENTRUM NEUROPSYCHIATRII SP. Z O. O.. Summary: Legal Services for Investments Entitled: "Construction of a Psychiatric Ward for Children with a Hospital School in the Masovian Neuropsychiatry Center in Józefów - Stage Ii Construction". Description: 1. The subject of the contract is the provision of services in the field of uninterrupted, systematic and comprehensive legal services for the investment carried out as a task entitled: "Construction of a psychiatric ward for children with a hospital school in the Masovian Center Neuropsychiatry in Józefów - stage II construction" aimed at achieving the intended goal. The goal of the Ordering Party is to perform its statutory tasks and those resulting from legal provisions, in all units operating in the hospital and school premises in Józefowie. 2. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPAL SPECIALIST HOSPITAL NAMED AFTER GABRIEL NARUTOWICZ IN KRAKOW. Summary: Accelerating the Processes of Digital Transformation of Health Care through further Development of Digital Services at the Municipal Specialist Hospital. Gabriela Narutowicz in Krakow-Ii. Description: The subject of the order is: "Accelerating the processes of digital transformation of health care through further development of digital services at the Gabriel Narutowicz Municipal Specialist Hospital in Krakow-II." The order was divided into 3 parts: Part I concerns expansion or purchase of a hospital information system (HIS), part II concerns the implementation of an IT system for digitizing paper documentation, including at least an information card on hospital treatment along with the purchase of equipment (scanner) in integration with the existing hospital system (HIS), part III concerns the expansion of existing hospital systems (HIS, RIS/PACS) with functionality enabling integration and data exchange with the intelligent services platform (PUI) in the field of AI, supporting the process of making diagnostic and treatment decisions by a doctor. The proceedings are financed under the National Reconstruction and Resilience Plan, Component D "Efficiency, accessibility and quality of the health care system" Investment D1.1.2 "Accelerating digital transformation processes in health care through further development of digital services in health care." The subject of the order is described in detail in the attached description of the subject of the order constituting Annex No. 1A, 1B and 1C to these terms of reference. The procedure is conducted in compliance with horizontal principles, therefore, when submitting an offer, Contractors confirm with a declaration that it was prepared in accordance with.... Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-01-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: Providing a comprehensive laundry service for products owned by SPZOZ WSS No. 3 in Rybnik and providing a comprehensive laundry service with the lease of products owned by Wyk... A detailed description of the subject of the order and the terms of execution of the order constituting the basis for calculating the offer price are included in the attachments: 1) Price form - Annex No. 1.A 2) Detailed description of the subject of the order - Annex No. 1.B.1 3) Description of trolleys used to transport laundry - Annex No. 1.B.2 4) Description of the subject of the order regarding the assortment that is the subject lease along with specifying the equipment and requirements for a comprehensive IT system for operating and controlling the laundry cycle process in the RFID UHF system or equivalent - Annex No. 1.B.3 5)Environmental protection and protection policy fire protection at SPZOZ WSS No. 3 in Rybnik - Annex No. 1.C 6) Designed provisions of the contract that will be introduced into the content of the contract - Annex No. 2 to the SWZ. The Ordering Party informs that in accordance with Art. 139 of the Public Procurement Law, it will first examine and evaluate the offers, and then the subjective qualification of the Contractor whose offer was rated the highest, in terms of the lack of grounds for exclusion and meeting the conditions for acceptance.... These services, in accordance with Art. 3 point 1 letter a, b, c of the Act of August 19, 1994 on the protection of mental health (Journal of Laws of 2024, item 917), are addressed to people: a) with mental disorders (including people showing psychotic disorders), b) with intellectual disability (mental retardation), c) indicating other disturbances in mental functions which, based on current medical knowledge, are classified as mental disorders and which require health services or other forms of support and care necessary for life in a family or social environment. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: COAL MINING MUSEUM IN ZABRZE. Summary: Construction and Delivery of Two Sets of Boats and their Retrieval System for the Mgw in Zabrze. Description: The subject of the order is: "Manufacture and delivery of two sets of boats and their retrieval system for the needs of the MGW in Zabrze", which are a component of the transport system on the waterway located in the workings of the Main Key Heritage Adit. Within In order to complete the above task, two sets of boats must be made, delivered and launched, consisting of two boats connected together, made on the basis of a design owned by the Ordering Party, approved by the Polish Register of Shipping S.A. constituting Attachment No. 1 to the description of the subject of the order, including the delivery and installation of the boat recovery system in the designated location in accordance with the project constituting Attachment No. 2. As part of the implementation of the above task, all costs should also be calculated materials necessary to complete the electrical installation to power the battery charging system located on board the boats in question and the boat steering system in the port. A vision is possible to prepare the offer local under the conditions set out in the SWZ. A detailed description of the subject of the order is included in Annex No. 2 to the SWZ with attachments. Summary: Supervision of the Operation of the Hospital Boiler Room and Heat Distribution Centers, Including Inspections of Boilers, Boiler Burners, Gas Detection Installations, Automation, and Repairs of Devices in the Boiler Room and Heat Distribution Cent.... Description: 1. The subject of the order is the provision, over a period of 24 months, of services in the scope of supervising the operation of the hospital boiler room together with heating nodes in hospital buildings, ensuring the continuity of their operation and efficiency, in order to service hospital needs regarding central heating, process heat, domestic hot water and steam. The scope of the service includes: supervision, operation, inspections, maintenance, service and operation of technical equipment, as well as repairs with a total value not exceeding the amount constituting the difference between the amount for the supervision service to the extent necessary for the proper implementation of the service, annual inspections and servicing of boilers, together with service inspections of boiler burners, including their regulation and inspections GAZEX gas detection system. In the case of major repairs exceeding the above value, they will be carried out by the Ordering Party. 2. Common Procurement Vocabulary CPV: Main CPV code: 50531100-7 - boiler repair and maintenance services heating. 3. The subject of the order includes 1 indivisible part. Justification: The Ordering Party did not divide the contract into parts due to the fact that the services provided include supervision and repairs of interconnected devices and installations/systems. Failure or incorrect setting of parameters of one of the devices or system affects the final operation of the entire system - domestic hot water, central heating, central heating and steam installations. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: OLSZTYN COMMUNE. Summary: "Traffic Study and Development of a Traffic Model for the Olsztyn Functional Urban Area". Description: 1. The subject of the order is to carry out a traffic study together with the development of a traffic model for the Olsztyn Functional Urban Area. The main goal of conducting traffic research and developing a traffic model for the Olsztyn Functional Urban Area is obtaining current and reliable data on the travel of residents of Olsztyn and the communes of its functional area and preparing an up-to-date traffic model using this data. These data must include all trips made by respondents indicated dates, on weekdays, during morning and afternoon rush hours, both by individual and collective transport. The ordering party divided the order execution into two stages: 1) Stage I: a) methodological preparation b)survey research in households, c) road traffic measurement, d) measurement of passenger traffic, e) test report. 2) Stage II: a) traffic model and forecasts, b)implementation of the acquired data into macrosimulation software, c) acquisition and delivery of the so-called data Big Date d) report on model construction and traffic forecasts. The detailed scope of the service is specified in the Description of the subject of the Order constituting Appendix No. 8 to the SWZ, and the Draft Provisions of the Agreement constituting Appendix No. 7 to the SWZ. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PROVINCIAL LABOR OFFICE IN KIELCE. Summary: Conducting a Foresight Research Service Pn. "Świętokrzyski Labor Market in 2035 - Development Scenarios". Description: 1. The subject of the order is a research service including: 1)preparation of a methodological report, 2) organizing, coordinating and conducting a foresight study, the final result of which will be the creation (in the form of a final report) of four scenarios regarding the development of the Świętokrzyskie labor market in the perspective of 2035, with particular emphasis on the demand for skills, i.e.: a) aspirational (optimistic) scenario, describing, among others, conditions necessary to achieve equilibrium between demand and supply and other factors necessary to achieve the competitiveness of the regional economy and the good condition of the labor market; b) risk/threat scenario (pessimistic), which will describe the condition of the regional labor market and economy in conditions for the fulfillment of the main development threats; c) moderate scenario in two variants, in which the situation on the labor market will be described in terms of extrapolation of current, selected tendencies and trends. Each scenario will have a description development of the situation along with an assessment of the probability of its occurrence and a description of the implications separately for each of the four scenarios. The scenarios should take into account the evolution of the regional labor market under the influence of endogenous and exogenous factors, affecting individual aspects of the socio-economic life of the region. The contractor should identify and examine the significance of individual factors and assess the strength of their impact on the labor market. 2.Research objectives: 1) Ce.... Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-01-20. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

As part of the service, the Contractor will provide: (A) materials educational: art, office and toys; (B) graphic design and printing of materials, and (C) packaging of educational materials and printouts into "educational packages" and their delivery to the 115th OWP. Educational packages will serve OWP teachers until conducting 4 cycles of classes (so-called Bofka missions), one mission in each of the 4 competence groups: (1) language and culture, (2) modern technologies, (3) healthy development, (4) entrepreneurship - 8 classes in each mission (Cultural Mission, Technological Mission, Mission Ecological and Business Mission) - a total of 32 classes. The "educational package" (1,460 pieces) should be understood as a "classroom package" (1,000 pieces) and a "kindergarten package" (460 pieces) packed in a resealable cardboard box and opening during 8 activities carried out during one mission and storing them in stacks of at least 5 boxes. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: COMMUNE OF THE CITY OF GDAŃSK. Summary: Providing a Comprehensive Service in the Field of Reservation, Sale and Delivery of Airline Tickets on Domestic and Foreign Routes. Description: The subject of the order is the provision of a comprehensive service in the field of searching for the most advantageous flights in terms of price and time (hours), their reservation, sale and delivery of airline tickets, including tickets from low-cost carriers and related services, including: mediation in contacts with carriers in the field of loyalty programs, complaints, reservation changes, etc., in accordance with the needs of the Ordering Party. The order concerns the purchase of economy class tickets and with the FLEX option. Scope of the order covers domestic passenger transport and foreign passenger transport, on European sections (to/from European countries) and intercontinental sections outside Europe - provided by regular airlines and domestic transport. The Ordering Party reserves the right purchase of low-cost airline tickets for foreign flights, but only at the express request of the Ordering Party. Ticket reservations will be made depending on the actual needs of the Ordering Party.. Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2026-01-14. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: 1. The subject of the order is the catering service, preparation and delivery of meals to the center in Maogoszcz, from Monday to Friday, except for days off when the center is closed.2. The estimated number of servings is 58 per day, consisting of: two breakfasts, one lunch (soup and main course), afternoon tea. The number of servings is an estimate. The final number of portions will depend on the number of children registered and attendance. Demands for a given day will be submitted via e-mail via the Live Kid application by 7:00 on a given day.3. The Ordering Party informs that in accordance with Resolution No. V/39/24 of the City Council in Maogoszcz of September 24, 2024 on determining the amount of stay fees and the maximum fee for feeding a child in a nursery in Maogoszcz run by the Municipality Maogoszcz, the maximum fee for feeding a child in the nursery was set at PLN 18.00 per day.4. The meals provided should meet the following quality conditions: the menu should be varied, the type of dishes cannot be repeated within two weeks, in Lunch with a second course of meat or rice should be served at least three times a week.... Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2025-12-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The order includes a total of four periodic inspections, service and maintenance per year on the following dates: the first one by March 31, 2026 (determined as standard), the second until June 30, 2026 (annual), the third until September 30, 2026 (standard) and the fourth - until December 12, 2026 (referred to as annual). Individual maintenance: two standard maintenance (after Q1 and Q3), one routine maintenance and one annual maintenance varies in terms of the scope of activities required to ensure proper operation of the system. The scope of the first, third and fourth maintenance includes general cleaning of technological devices necessary for the proper functioning of the system. The car wash consists of two two-station halls (4 stations in total), one of which is a semi-automatic high-pressure manual car wash with washing sections No. 1 and 2. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: SOCIAL SERVICES CENTER IN RADZIONKÓW. Summary: Running a Senior Club as Part of the "Cus" Project - a New Look at Social Services. Description: The activities undertaken at the Senior Club are aimed at the comprehensive development of seniors, covering the social, health, cultural and educational spheres. The goal is to create a space that will enable seniors to pursue their passions and interests, as well as improve quality of life through various forms of activity. The classes will include workshops, talks and joint trips, enabling participants to acquire new skills and knowledge. Thanks to such initiatives, seniors will not only expand their knowledge, but also improve their digital, art and health skills. They will also have the opportunity to improve their physical and mental fitness and integrate with other project participants, which will contribute to reducing the feeling of loneliness and marginalization. Target group to which a social service is targeted. It concerns people over 60 years of age who will take part in 4 editions, with 1 edition consisting of approximately 40 people, divided into 2 groups of 20 people and 4 subgroups of 10 people. The total number of people participating in the above service is approximately 160 people. Time implementation: from the date of conclusion of the contract until December 31, 2027, between 12:00 and 22:00.. Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2025-12-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: SOCIAL SERVICES CENTER IN RADZIONKÓW. Summary: Carrying out Social Services as Part of the "Cus" Project - a New Look at Social Services. Description: The service provided by a psychologist - diagnostician is a service based on the assessment and analysis of various aspects of people's mental functioning in order to diagnose their problems, difficulties and potential. Psychological diagnosis aims to improve functioning project participant in both personal and social life. A psychologist - diagnostician diagnoses all types of mental disorders, i.e. developmental disorders (ADHD, autism spectrum disorders, intellectual disabilities) and depression or post-traumatic stress disorder. A psychologist-diagnostician has the competence to conduct an interview with a patient and is able to draw conclusions, and then carry out a diagnosis using appropriate tools. Ultimately, it is planned to support from 50 to 100 people. Group target will be qualified in accordance with the rules of the Regulations on Recruitment and Participation in the CUS Project A New Look at Social Services. Implementation time: from the date of conclusion of the contract to December 31, 2027.. Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2025-12-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: CIECHANÓW COMMUNE. Summary: Catching and Providing Care for Homeless Animals from the Ciechanów Commune. Description: The subject of the proceedings is the service of catching and providing care for homeless dogs from the Ciechanów commune and concerns services related to catching dogs and caring for caught and taken over homeless dogs. 1. Description of the subject of the order: 1) catching homeless dogs from the Ciechanów commune, the intervention time cannot be longer than 6 hours from sending the notification (during the Contractor's working hours). Intervention is considered to be the commencement of activities related to catching the dog at the place indicated in registration without travel time. When reporting, the location of the homeless animal, a description of the animal and other useful information for completing the task will be indicated. After catching the animal, it is to be immediately delivered to the shelter run by Contractor. In the case of a dog that has bitten a human, the Contractor is obliged to start activities related to catching the homeless dog within no more than 4 hours of sending the report, catching the dog and delivering it to a veterinarian for observation. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PSZCZYNA CULTURAL CENTER. Summary: Conducting Group Workshops on Psychology Support Within the Mobile Local Integration Club for Project Participants: "From Cultural Transformation to Local Integration".... Description: Conducting group workshops on psychology support within the Mobile Local Integration Club for project participants: "From Cultural Transformation to Local Integration"... Conducting group workshops on the subject psychological support within the Mobile Local Integration Club for project participants: From Cultural Transformation to Local Integration Conducting 540 hours of group workshops in the field of diversity psychology and resilience building mental health is an element of psychological support offered to project participants as part of the Mobile Local Integration Club. The workshops are psychoeducational and developmental in nature, their aim is to support participants in coping with their experiences. discrimination, exclusion and prejudice, as well as strengthening their mental resources in the context of challenges related to cultural and social diversity of identities. The classes are not health services financed by the National Health Fund, but are a free form of support adapted to the individual and group needs of participants identified during the project implementation. Workshops promote better understanding of yourself and others, developing awareness of identity (including cultural, sexual, religious and worldview), as well as shaping attitudes of openness and empathy in social relationships. One group will be led by one psychological trainer throughout the entire cycle. Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2025-12-30. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: INTERGENERATIONAL ACTIVITY CENTER "NOWOLIPIE". Summary: Providing Physical Fitness Classes for Seniors (90+) - Warsaw Insurgents. Description: The subject of the order is to conduct physical rehabilitation classes for seniors (90+) of the Warsaw Insurgents. Part I of the order covers the following districts of the capital city: Warsaw: Biaoka, Bielany, Oliborz, Bemowo and Wola. Movement improvement classes will be carried out at the place of residence/stay of the Participants (i.e. in private apartments/houses) in the districts covered by the subject of the order, as well as at the headquarters of the Warsaw Insurgents House CAM Nowolipie at 22 Nowolipie Street or another headquarters indicated by the Ordering Party in Warsaw. The number of hours of classes conducted per month will be agreed each time with the selected Contractor, subject to the minimum (250 hours) and maximum number of hours (480 hours). Detailed description of the subject the order is included in Appendix No. 4 to the SWZ. The Contractor is obliged to cooperate with the Ordering Party at every stage of the implementation of the subject of the contract. The Description of the Subject of the Order is supplemented by the conditions for the implementation of the Subject of the Order included in the Contract Template, which constitutes Appendix No. 5 to SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2025-12-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: COAL MINING MUSEUM IN ZABRZE. Summary: Protection of People and Property - through Direct Physical Protection and Technical Security - in Areas Used by the Coal Mining Museum in Zabrze. Description: 1. The order is divided into a basic order and an option right.1.1. The basic order includes: - permanent physical protection provided by qualified and unqualified physical security employees, at posts, - event security (up to 1,100 hours), - receiving signals from the Ordering Party's technical security systems by the Alarm Monitoring Station (SMA).1.2. The option law includes: - the Contractor's assurance, as part of the execution of the order, of readiness to provide additional physical protection services for up to 350 hours unqualified physical security workers who meet the conditions for security workers described in the Agreement, as well as in the SWZ and in the annex to the SWZ-OPZ. The Ordering Party will use these hours in particular in cases where there is a need to establish an emergency post, strengthening the existing post, extending its working hours, - as part of the execution of the order, the Contractor will ensure readiness to provide event security services, also when the Ordering Party uses 1,100 hours for security of events planned in basic order. The Option Law provides for 2,100 hours for this purpose.. Published Date: 2025-12-19. Closing Date: 2026-01-02. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: "ZIELONOGÓRSKIE WODOCIĄGI I KANALIZACJA" SP. Z O. O.. Summary: "Actions to Reduce Water Losses - Delivery of Water Meter Covers". Description: The subject of this order is the expansion of the remote reading system (System) of water meters operating at the Ordering Party, including the creation, implementation and operation of a stationary reading system based on the Internet of Things (IoT) technology, using radio communication techniques using LoRaWAN, LTE Cat-M, NB-IoT or equivalent transmission. The purpose of the order is to modernize and develop the existing System, which currently consists of the Temetra Application Platform and approximately 2,100 pieces Radio modules mounted on water meters, from which data is read in a "bypassed" manner. As a result of the implementation of this order, a stationary reading system will be created that will ensure automatic, continuous and unattended reading of data from Water meters based on IoT communication, integration with the existing Temetra application platform. The designed reading system will include in particular: • construction and launch of LoRaWAN/LTE/NB-IoT communication infrastructure (including communication gateways, antennas, network and application servers), • configuration, integration and implementation of the System in the Ordering Party's environment, • delivery and installation of 18,000 pieces of IoT radio modules during the term of the Agreement, •delivery and adaptation to the needs of the Ordering Party 15 pieces of Devices for configuring IoT radio modules, necessary for the proper functioning of the Reading System, • launching the Reading System and ensuring data transmission in the entire area of Z.... input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: LESSER POLAND VOIVODESHIP. Summary: Implementation of the Research Project Entitled "Quality Forecast of the Demand for Competences in Małopolska". Description: 1. The subject of the order is the implementation of a research project entitled "Quality forecast of the demand for competences in Małopolska." 2. The qualitative forecast of the demand for competences in Małopolska is intended to show the key competences in the next 3 years competences in selected industries in terms of the most important professions. As part of the work, the contractor will be responsible for proposing a qualitative forecasting system for the demand for competences in Małopolska, based on available data and indicators. The solution proposal organized within the developed methodology will allow for forecasts to be made in several selected industries and will enable planning research in the remaining ones. 3. The study entitled "Quality forecast of the demand for competences in Małopolska" is the second stage of examining the demand for competences in Małopolska and is intended to show key competences on the labor market within 3 years. Qualitative forecasting will use indicators fed by data collected in the framework monitoring job offers, i.e. the quantitative stage of the research. Forecasting will be cyclical based on the methodology prepared by the Contractor, enabling the achievement of comparable results for the analyzed industries. 4. Description of the subject of the order (OPZ) constitutes Annex No. 1D to the SWZ and will be introduced as an annex to the public procurement contract. 5. The terms and conditions of the contract are included in the draft provisions of the public procurement contract.... Published Date: 2025-12-18. Closing Date: 2026-01-09. Competition: ICB. The "educational package" (1,460 pieces) should be understood as a "classroom package" (1,000 pieces) and a "kindergarten package" (460 pieces) packed in a resealable cardboard box and opening during 8 activities carried out during one mission and storing them in stacks of at least 5 boxes. "Preparation and delivery of educational packages for conducting classes in 115 Preschool Education Centers in the BOF area “Integrated Program for the Development of Talents and Key Competencies in BOF Kindergartens” (Project No. FEPD.08.02-IZ.00-0003/24)” The subject of the order is the preparation and delivery of...

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: EDUCATIONAL RESEARCH INSTITUTE - NATIONAL RESEARCH INSTITUTE. Summary: Conducting a Longitudinal Study in the Seventh and Eighth Grades of Primary Schools.. Description: The subject of the order is to carry out two measurements of a longitudinal study on a sample of the same respondents: seventh-grade students of primary schools in the 2025/2026 school year, and then the same students in the 8th grade in the 2026/2027 school year. Test will be carried out in randomly selected units in 100 primary schools. The sample will be drawn by the Ordering Party. The study will use measurement tools provided by the Ordering Party. The Contractor is obliged to perform each measurement is to conduct the examination and collect Data about the student and Data from the parent/legal guardian, in accordance with the scope specified by the Ordering Party. The Ordering Party estimates that the study will cover from 3,107 to 3,231 students, assuming 100% implementation of the trial (all students in randomly selected classes). Detailed information regarding the subject of the order is included in Annex No. 7 - Description of the Subject of the Order. Conducting a longitudinal study in seventh and eighth grades basic. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: POMERANIAN VOIVODESHIP. Summary: Preparation and Conduct of Training in Accordance with the Provisions of the Regulation of the Council of Ministers of March 30, 2020 on Training for Employees of the Social Service Center. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the service of preparing and conducting training in accordance with the provisions of the Regulation of the Council of Ministers of March 30, 2020 on training for employees of social services centers (Journal of Laws of 2020, item 664) in the voivodeship Pomeranian Voivodeship, including: •Module I - training in the management and organization of social services, 60 hours; •Module II - training in the development and implementation of individual social service plans, 52 hours; •Module III - training in local community organization, 57 hours. 2. A detailed description of the subject of the order is specified in Annex No. 1 to the SWZ and in the contract template, which constitutes Annex No. 2 to the SWZ. The Ordering Party provides for the application of law option referred to in Art. 441 of the Public Procurement Law, in a situation where the number of people willing to participate in individual training modules significantly exceeds the number of participants assumed by the Ordering Party. The option assumes an increase in the subject of the order by a maximum of 6 additional training courses (in the scope of module I, II or III, depending on demand), while maintaining the gross unit price per person indicated for the basic order, taking into account that the option will be implemented within 12 months from the date of conclusion of the contract. The option right will mean that the Ordering Party may commission the organization of additional training, but the Contractor is not entitled to any claim against the Ordering Party.... Published Date: 2025-12-17. Closing Date: 2026-01-14. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

TASK II Comprehensive maintenance of the existing ITS Opole system and elements developed as part of the TASK I The scope of maintenance works concerns the entire infrastructure of the existing and expanded ITS Opole system, where the System infrastructure includes all components of the Intelligent Transport System implemented in the city of Opole (in accordance with the documentation as-built - Annex No. 3.1. to SOPZ), together with all elements of functional subsystems, including the entire physical, IT, virtual infrastructure, etc., as well as all elements of the infrastructure of facilities with traffic lights constructed as part of other investment tasks and incorporated into the System (in accordance with the calculation in Annex No. 4 to SOPZ), the entire infrastructure and configuration of facilities/devices connected to the System during its period.... In the scope of the Subject of the Order implemented in accordance with the provisions of section 2, the contractor is entitled to replace the steam locomotive with a replacement locomotive other than steam with parameters not worse than those specified in Annex No. 3 to the Template Agreement in an amount not exceeding 7 days falling in subsequent 30-day implementation periods, and in the case of an incomplete 30-day period, this amount should be calculated proportionally. 4. The Contractor, as part of the Subject of the Order, is obliged to: a. running the Ordering Party's passenger trains, included in the annual timetable provided by PKP Polskie Linie Kolejowe S.A., an extract of which is Annex No. 1 to the Template Agreement on the Wolsztyn - Poznań Główny - Wolsztyn and Wolsztyn - Zbąszynek - Wolsztyn routes. b.performing station maneuvers of train sets, c.on the order of the train manager. The ordering party will pay for the number of people actually referred and the days of stay in the shelter.

Summary: Reconstruction of the 110/15 Kv Wyrzysk [Wyr] Station Along with the Reconstruction of Existing Hv and Mv Line Connections (S-2025-07577). Description: The subject of the order is the implementation of a task including design, delivery, assembly, construction, commissioning and commissioning of the 110/15 kV Wyrzysk [WYR] double-transformer station, hereinafter referred to as GPZ WYRZYSK, along with the demolition of the existing station and restoration of existing HV and MV linear connections. The construction of the new station will functionally replace the currently operating GPZ WYRZYSK, which is scheduled for demolition, and will increase the available connection capacity in the region. In order to carry out the work, you must obtain all opinions, arrangements, consents, decisions, permits, notifications, etc. required by applicable law. All works must be performed in accordance with the Terms of Reference (SWZ) together with annexes, including this annex, hereinafter referred to as PFU, and in the part not described in the PFU, in accordance with the guidelines defined as "Standards in the distribution network of Enea Operator Sp. z o.o." input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: POMERANIAN TEACHER EDUCATION CENTER IN GDAŃSK. Summary: Comprehensive Organization of a National Study Visit. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the comprehensive organization of a national study visit to the Greater Poland Voivodeship for a group of approximately 30 participants, including career advisors and employees of institutions involved in activities in the field of career counseling and coordination of regional educational activities. 2. The order includes in particular: 1) providing bus transport on the Gdańsk - Greater Poland Voivodeship - Gdańsk route, including local transport services, 2)reservation and provision of accommodation for two nights in a hotel with a minimum three-star standard, 3) provision of full board including breakfasts, lunches, dinners, coffee breaks and an official dinner, 4) organizing a substantive program of the visit covering at least four meetings study in institutions operating in the field of career counseling, 5) preparation of the cultural and cognitive part consistent with the topic of the visit, 6) insurance of participants regarding the consequences of accidents and medical costs, 7) assurance a coordinator responsible for the course of the visit and ongoing contact with the Ordering Party. 3.The visit is planned for March 2026 and will last three days, from Wednesday to Friday. 4. The detailed program and schedule will be agreed between the Ordering Party and the contractor within 14 business days from the date of signing the contract. 5. A detailed description of the subject of the order is attached as Appendix No. 1 to the SWZ. 6. The Ordering Party does not allow the submission of partial offers. 7.The contractor may entrust.... Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPAL ROAD AND COMMUNICATION AUTHORITY IN RADOM. Summary: Design, Construction and Launch of the Intelligent Transport System in Radom (Hereinafter Referred to as the "Its System") in Connection with the Implementation of the Project Entitled: "Development of Urban Mobility Infrastructure.... Description: Design, construction and launch of the Intelligent Transport System in Radom (hereinafter referred to as the "ITS System") in connection with the implementation of the project entitled: "Development of urban mobility infrastructure... The subject of the order is design, construction and launch of the Intelligent Transport System in Radom (hereinafter referred to as the "ITS System") in connection with the implementation of the project entitled: "Development of urban mobility infrastructure in the Radom Functional Area - stages I and II". The order is being processed is in the "design and build" mode, so it consists of two basic stages: the design stage and the implementation stage. The order includes the design, installation and commissioning of the ITS system and the reconstruction of selected geometries intersections. The order includes: - reconstruction and construction of traffic lights at 39 intersections and pedestrian crossings, - adaptation of traffic lights at 39 intersections and pedestrian crossings to work in the ITS system, - implementation on the 39th intersections and pedestrian crossings equipped with traffic lights, priority for public transport, - delivery and launch of an IT application integrating ITS subsystems, - reconstruction of the geometry of intersections, - Center equipment Traffic Control and server room, - implementation of a data transmission network, - delivery of electric vehicles. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: 6TH MILITARY ECONOMIC DIVISION. Summary: Medical Support Service for Military Activities in 2026.. Description: The contractor is obliged to provide simultaneously (at one time) two medical teams, i.e. ready to perform services in the event of simultaneous provision of overlapping military activities conducted in different places. Members of the security team must include a driver, a paramedic, a paramedic and an ambulance vehicle. The medical team should have documents confirming qualifications to practice the profession (professional title of bachelor's or master's degree in paramedic or an appropriate diploma obtaining title/qualifications of a paramedic, certificate of completion of a course in qualified first aid (KPP) along with the title of Rescuer in the case of a driver-rescuer). The driver must have a license to drive an emergency vehicle. The contractor is able to provide at least two medical teams at one time. The above-mentioned medical teams will be included in the military medical support system at the time of its use at the place and time indicated by the Ordering Party, and this information will be provided to the contractor 72 hours in advance.. Published Date: 2025-12-15. Closing Date: 2025-12-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The driver must have a license to drive an emergency vehicle. The contractor is able to provide at least two medical teams at one time.
